All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BackgroundSound
BackgroundSound plays background sound while the GUI is stil on or not exited from
CatchWord
CatchWord Thread to monitor the word that has been typed.
DuplicateRemover
DuplicateRemover Thread to remove duplicate words from the game active environment
FallingWord
FallingWord blueprint for the falling words, has all the methods and attribute to find, modify and signal an event based on the word position
GamePanel
GamePanel Thread to draw the GUI panel
HungryWordMover
HungryWordMover removes the words that are bumped by the Hungry Word
Score
 
ScoreUpdater
ScoreUpdater class to update the score of the game
TypingTutorApp
TypingTutorApp class to run all the threads and also the setUp the GUI environment for the game
WordDictionary
WordDictionary class that contains the falling words to be used during the game
WordMover
WordMover class to move the falling words
